items.name: Lounge Elegance Espresso
items.description: Rich and full-bodied, our signature espresso blend with notes of dark chocolate and toasted nuts.

items.name: Velvet Mocha Delight
items.description: Silky mocha infused with a hint of vanilla, crowned with velvety whipped cream.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato Symphony
items.description: A harmonious blend of espresso, steamed milk, and caramel drizzle.

items.name: Hazelnut Heaven Latte
items.description: Creamy latte with the nutty goodness of hazelnut syrup.

items.name: French Vanilla Cappuccino
items.description: Classic cappuccino with a touch of French vanilla sweetness.

items.name: Buttery Croissants
items.description: Flaky and buttery croissants baked to perfection.

items.name: Flaky Almond Danishes
items.description: Delicate pastries filled with almond paste and sliced almonds.

items.name: Blueberry Streusel Muffins
items.description: Moist muffins bursting with blueberries and a crumbly streusel top.

items.name: Chocolate-Filled Scones
items.description: Tender scones with a surprise chocolate center.

items.name: Raspberry Cream Cheese Danish
items.description: Sweet and tangy raspberry filling in a cream cheese danish.

items.name: Artisanal Dark Chocolate Truffles
items.description: Luxurious dark chocolate truffles dusted with cocoa powder.

items.name: Handcrafted Praline Bonbons
items.description: Praline-filled bonbons topped with a caramelized nut.

items.name: Pistachio and Sea Salt Toffee
items.description: Crunchy toffee coated in pistachios and sea salt.

items.name: Raspberry White Chocolate Bark
items.description: Creamy white chocolate with swirls of raspberry and a sprinkle of almonds.

items.name: Salted Caramel Brownie Bites
items.description: Fudgy brownie bites with a caramel drizzle and a touch of sea salt.
